row.process:
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Application Name " : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_JVM_APP_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Location " : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_APP_LOCATION#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Java Bin Directory " : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_JAVA_BIN_DIR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Advanced Options " : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_ADVANCED_OPTIONS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Connection Tool " : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_TOOLS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
